attributes.action: all councils to build bigger 4/5/6 bedroomed houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need more bigger houses like 4/5/6 bedrooms and not via private landlords.
the council has sold off the morjority of its stock so we need them to start to replace it so we can start to bring down the waiting lists and the time we have to wait to get one, now the councils have brought out a wacky idea that you have to bid for a home which is so UNFAIR to anyone other than them on the top of the list they are the ones who get it which is stupid when the person mostly does not bid and still gets it and not the person on these lists also there is alot of propertys that are withdrawn when we could have them they take them for the imagrants and not the people who have lived here all there lives
there is alot of people still in bigger houses and don't need the room with only 1/2 people in it when it could go to people like us who needs more room our kids have a future too. please give them this chance in life
